statements: UPDATE feedback_table SET government_official='Mayor Smith', feedback_message='Great job!' WHERE feedback_id=1
UPDATE feedback_table SET date_submitted='2022-08-15 09:30:00', citizen_name='Alice' WHERE feedback_id=2
UPDATE feedback_table SET feedback_message = 'Updated feedback message' WHERE feedback_id = 1
UPDATE feedback_table SET government_official = 'New Official', date_submitted = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE citizen_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE citizen_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Good Service' WHERE citizen_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE government_officials SET office_address = '456 Main Street' WHERE department = 'Public Works';
UPDATE citizen_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great service, thank you!', submission_date = '2022-03-15 10:00:00' WHERE citizen_name = 'Alice' AND feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE government_officials SET office_address = '123 Main Street, CityName, State, ZIP' WHERE department = 'Transportation' AND official_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE citizen_feedback SET citizen_name = 'John Doe', feedback_text = 'Great service' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE government_officials SET department = 'Health Department', email = 'health@gov.com' WHERE official_id = 3;
UPDATE citizen_feedback SET feedback_text='Excellent service!' WHERE feedback_id=1;
UPDATE complaints SET complaint_text='Resolved the issue promptly' WHERE complaint_id=3;
UPDATE Citizens SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE citizen_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Officials SET department = 'Finance', position = 'Manager' WHERE official_id = '789e0123-f456-45ab-cdef-012345678900';
UPDATE Citizens SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE citizen_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE Complaints SET resolved = true, complaint_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE complaint_id = '456e89b7-d12e-3a45-8426-614174000123'

UPDATE Complaints SET status = 'Resolved', description = 'Issue resolved successfully' WHERE complaint_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
